message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats into it further.
You were generous, I'll meet you halfway, but I still need a bit more
Okay, last offer. This is a fair deal considering the inflation.  Let's close this out and both get something!
You said it's your last offer, but I'll give you another chance, slightly better split
Look, I've been patient, but this is ridiculous.  We're wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option now. Take it or leave it.
